item.title: Excel条件格式化
item.description: 刚才下载了最近在KGS的对局记录，表格格式如下： White Black Type Result Hactar [3d] Artem [1d] Ranked W+Res. Hactar [3d] dariari [2d] Ranked W+Res. Hactar [3d] oayamado [3d] Ranked W+17.5 Hactar [3d] gukkei [3d] Ranked W+Res. Hactar [3d] hansuiob [2d] Ranked W+Res. Hactar [3d] matane11 [3d] Ranked B+11.5 Hactar [3d] gokichiB [2d] Ranked W+Res. Hactar [3d] man8888 [?] Ranked W+Res. Hactar [3d] novak [3d] Ranked W+3.5 Horizoneer [3d] Hactar [3d] Ranked B+Res. Hactar [3d] Frusci [2d] Ranked B+Res.
